channel.title: Packages on CreatureSurvive
channel.description: Recent content in Packages on CreatureSurvive

item.title: FastDel
item.description: Version 0.3 (July 1, 2017) Rewrote the whole project This project is now open source Version 0.2 (March 18, 2017) iOS 10.2 support The previous update for iOS 10 actually only worked up to 10.1.1. The settings pane would not show up on 10.2 rendering FastDel unless, this is now fixed. Version 0.1 (January 28, 2017) iOS 10 support Version 0.0.8 (October 20, 2016) another preferences rewrite no respring required for any prefs changes prefs text field now updates immediately to reflect current settings added option to disable cursor smoothing Version 0.

item.title: FastDel
item.description: This tweak disables the annoying delete word function and enables rapid character deletion instantly. FastDel is now open source!

item.title: FlatFields
item.description: Version 0.0.5 (September 30, 2016) removed unnecessary hook Version 0.0.4 (September 29, 2016) updated package with support email minor refactoring Version 0.0.3 (September 29, 2016) fixed typo Version 0.0.2 (September 29, 2016) Initial Release

item.title: FlatFields
item.description: Removes background bubbles from textfields system wide

item.title: InteligentPower
item.description: This tweak enables Low Power Mode when locking the device. When unlocking the device Low Power Mode will be disabled but only if the current battery charge is above the threshold that the user sets in the tweak settings

item.title: PredictionStickAround
item.description: disables swipe to dismiss on the predictive keyboard bar.

item.title: PullToClear
item.description: Version 0.3.1 (October 14, 2017) Official support for NCLink10 Lots of refactoring and little improvements, that you should not notice Version 0.2.1 (October 11, 2017) initial public release no 3rd party tweak support yet

item.title: PullToClear
item.description: PullToClear notifications on the LockScreen and NotificationCenter on iOS 10 custom fonts custom labels custom pull distance custom colors this is a beta

item.title: ToothModule
item.description: Version 1.0.1b (October 13, 2017) Added Silo compatibility Removed backup section in settings Version 1.0.0b (October 11, 2017) initial release

item.title: ToothModule
item.description: Quickly connect/disconnect from bluetooth devices using your Control center Configure device in settings. Requires either: CCSupport Package or Silo Package

item.title: WTFEclipse
item.description: Version 0.4.2b (August 13, 2018) Initial Release Fixed AppStore ‘more’ labels Fixed Safari ‘Open In’ alerts iOS 11 only (for now)

item.title: WTFEclipse
item.description: Fix annoying bugs in Eclipse. currently only supports iOS 11.x (iOS 10 support may be added soon) Any feature requests should be submitted to support@creaturecoding.com

item.title: alwaysPlaying
item.description: Version 0.1.0 (October 11, 2017) now updates the LockScreen instantly (you no longer need to lock and unlock your device for the controls to appear) Version 0.0.7 (October 9, 2017) initial release

item.title: alwaysPlaying
item.description: force now playing controls on LS via activator

item.title: alwaysPlaying
item.description: Version 0.0.5 (January 28, 2017) iOS 10 support Version 0.0.1 (September 20, 2016) Initial Release

item.title: alwaysPlaying
item.description: Version 0.1.0 (October 11, 2017) now updates the LockScreen instantly (you no longer need to lock and unlock your device for the controls to appear) Version 0.0.7 (October 9, 2017) initial release

item.title: alwaysPlaying
item.description: Version 0.1.0 (October 11, 2017) now updates the LockScreen instantly (you no longer need to lock and unlock your device for the controls to appear) Version 0.0.7 (October 9, 2017) initial release

item.title: attributionless
item.description: Version 0.1.0 (May 12, 2018) fixed typos Version 0.0.7 (May 5, 2018) initial release

item.title: attributionless
item.description: Removes the wether provider attribution text in the Notification Center and Today View on iOS 10 & 11 (maybe 9 as well).

item.title: bubbles
item.description: Version 0.3.0b (August 27, 2018) Fixed App Drawer not hiding correctly Fixed disappearing cells when selecting a conversation Fixed adjusted contact information background blur to be darker for dark/black mode (more customization coming soon) Added iOS 10 support (likely has bugs, consider iOS 10 support to be in alpha) Version 0.2.9b (August 17, 2018) Fixed Disable App Drawer not working Fixed App bar color not working(temporary fix, proper fix coming tomorrow) Version 0.

item.title: bubbles
item.description: bubbles gives your messages app a more modern look by adding a sense of depth to the conversation cells. Oh, and it comes with a completely customizable Light/Dark mode! This Is A Beta Release All bug reports must be submitted through GitHub Issues, or they will be ignored! Any other support needs, please use the Support tab in the bubbles settings. You can also contact me in my Slack group’s #betas Channel at Creature Survive Tweak’s

item.title: copyVideoURL
item.description: Version 0.0.1-7 (April 28, 2018) Compiled to support iOS 9 - 11 Added depiction Version 0.0.1-7 (April 28, 2018) Initial Release

item.title: copyVideoURL
item.description: Copies the URL of videos played in the native MPMoviePlayerController. This is useful for using CromeCast with apps that don’t support it. This does not work for videos played in WebViews, or custom video players.

item.title: covert
item.description: Version 0.7 (July 10, 2018) toggle all covert conversations on and off swipe right on a hidden conversation to unhide it Version 0.6 (May 31, 2018) initial release

item.title: covert
item.description: Hide and mute conversations in Messages app, when you hide a conversation it will automatically mute notifications for that conversation. To hide messages, swipe right on the conversation and tap Hide. To show conversations Long press the Edit button and release, then you’ll be presented with the option to show/hide covert conversations.

item.title: crux
item.description: Version 1.0.0 (May 31, 2018) initial release

item.title: crux
item.description: run any command as root: crux /usr/bin/dpkg install com.

item.title: cyground
item.description: Version 1.2.0 (August 4, 2018) Rewrote the project Fixed an issue that would prevent the tweak from working for some users Version 1.0.0 (July 22, 2018) Initial Release

item.title: cyground
item.description: Run Cydia in the background. sources will continue refreshing even when launching the CC/NC/Switcher or using another app, you can even lock you device.

item.title: ebullience
item.description: Version 1.0.1b (May 21, 2018) fixed missing libCSPreferences dependency Version 1.0.0b (May 21, 2018) initial release

item.title: ebullience
item.description: Animates the loading of table UITableViewCells system wide. Configure animations from settings.

item.title: foresight
item.description: Replaces lockscreen hint text with the daily weather forecast

item.title: libCSColorPicker
item.description: Version 0.7.5 (August 17, 2018) Fixed issue with Eclipse altering color picker view Version 0.7.4 (August 17, 2018) Fixed issue with Eclipse altering color of cell previews Version 0.7.3 (July 28, 2018) libCSColorPicker will soon be open sourced on GitHub Added NSString convenience methods (instance & class) Added UIColor convenience methods (instance) Fixed issue where fallback would not work Change Refactored cell class Change Refactored background class Change Cleaned up ViewController Change Cleaned up slider class Change Added CSColorSliderType Change Cleaned up headers Change added credits where they were due (Background/UIViewParentController) Version 0.

item.title: libCSColorpicker
item.description: A simplistic yet powerful color picker for use in PreferenceLoader preference bundles. Supports iOS 9 - 11, other iOS versions have not been tested. Best when used with libCSPreference but also works fine on it’s own. For usage info and resources, check out libCSColorPicker on GitHub, soon to be open sourced.

item.title: libCSPreferences
item.description: Version 0.9.9.9-1 (August 17, 2018) Fixed layout on PSSliderCell value Fixed CSPDateCell saving issues Added support for slider labels and sublabel Version 0.9.9.9 (August 4, 2018) Fixed issue that may cause backups not to restore Added callbackAction specifier key that executes after restoring defaults/backups Version 0.9.9.8 (July 29, 2018) Fixed Nothing new, fixes a bug affecting some users where the Settings app would crash on launch Version 0.

item.title: libCSPreferences
item.description: A simple to use preference library for iOS 3DTouch support integrated color picker powerful font picker with custom font support theming support change log controller fully integrated backup/restore system zero coding required to integrate in your project crazy simple to use

item.title: libCSWeather
item.description: Version 0.5.6b (August 27, 2018) fix dumb mistake that may cause crashing on iOS 10 devices Version 0.5.5b (August 27, 2018) iOS 11 support Version 0.5.1b (January 23, 2018) further optimizations to fetching technique working on solution to verify and cache weather so it can persist through resprings without re-fetching Version 0.5.0b (January 22, 2018) reimplemented weather fetching technique added weather error reporting which logs to ‘/var/mobile/Documents/CSWeatherErrorLogs/’ Version 0.

item.title: libCSWeather
item.description: A simple little library for fetching the current weather information such as: current temperature (celsius/Fahrenheit) current temperature (celsius/Fahrenheit) based on weather preference setting daily high daily low current weather condition icon wether description more coming soon

item.title: noDropSheets
item.description: Removes airdrop section in share sheets. ONLY PARTIALLY WORKING AT THE MOMENT!

item.title: predictionStickAround
item.description: Version 0.0.2 (September 30, 2016) Refactor Version 0.0.1 (September 30, 2016) Initial Release

item.title: reachCC
item.description: Version 1.0.0 (May 6, 2018) Initial Release

item.title: reachCC
item.description: Activate the Control Center on iPhone X using the reachability gesture.

item.title: selectiveControls
item.description: Version 0.0.3 (October 11, 2017) initial release

item.title: selectiveControls
item.description: stop LockScreen Now Playing controls from showing up for blacklisted apps, configure from settings

item.title: sera
item.description: Version 0.6.7 (December 26, 2016) Completely rewrote artwork handling, all artwork bugs are now fixed and its a lot more efficient Added option to swap the share/like buttons on the media controls with shuffle/repeat buttons Major refactor in preparation for settings redesign Proper bug reporting coming soon This update contains a lot of rewritten code, if you experience any bugs please let me know Version 0.6.1.1 (December 23, 2016) Fixed bug in preferences where notification positioning with media controls present would not work at all if media controls alignment was set to top Version 0.

item.title: sera
item.description: is currently in beta and the feature set is not complete, you may encounter bugs. If you find any bugs please contact me via support in settings or via Cydia. Features Date & Time Date and time positioning Date and time height Date and time size Date and time background color Date and time background alpha Date and time font Date and time font size Media Media controls position Media controls size Media controls compact view Notifications Notification area position Notification area height Notification area background color Notification area background alpha Notification area background blur

item.title: shuffle
item.description: Version 0.6.6b (May 22, 2018) Added icons for preference bundles with missing icons Added icons for Packages and dylibs sections Version 0.6.5b (May 22, 2018) Hotfix for issue where packages marked as ‘Ignore Upgrades’ would cause the settings app to crash when viewing the package info Version 0.6.4b (May 22, 2018) Added ‘App Storage’ section to the Apps group Added ‘Tweak Dylibs’ section to the tweaks group Added ‘Debian Packages’ section to the tweaks group Added ‘Status’ section to DPKG group for viewing package details Added option to remove debs Added option to disable tweaks Version 0.

item.title: shuffle
item.description: Mix Up your preferences! Features: Tweaks Group Apps Group 3DTouch Support throughout the Settings app lots more planned. this is a beta package.

item.title: simmerDown
item.description: Version 1.3.1 (August 12, 2018) Added Support for ios 9.x + Now kills the Camera app, and then kills the mediaserverd process (should be working for everyone now) Version 1.0.1 (May 28, 2018) Fixed mediaserverd not actually being killed (silly sandbox) Version 1.0.0 (May 28, 2018) initial release

item.title: simmerDown
item.description: kill mediaserverd when the Camera app enters background or exits.

item.title: stretcher
item.description: Version 1.0.0b (May 11, 2018) initial release

item.title: stretcher
item.description: force apps to use full screen on iPhone X

item.title: switcherRadii
item.description: Version 1.0.2 (October 9, 2017) removed blurred backgrounds, that will be a seporate tweak Version 1.0.1 (October 4, 2017) Added blurred headers Version 1.0.0 (October 3, 2017) Initial Release

item.title: switcherRadii
item.description: sets the corner radius of the app switcher cards should support ios 9 and 10, but its only tested on 10

item.title: switcherRadiiXI
item.description: Version 1.0.0 (May 12, 2018) Initial Release

item.title: switcherRadiiXI
item.description: sets the corner radius of the app switcher cards should supports iOS 11.
